entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.258.3: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
🚀 NocoDB : Bug Fix Release

🐛 Closed Issues

  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Multi select content vanishing on page turn #9902
  • [🐛 Type: Bug][🏗️ Type: In Develop Branch] 🐛 Bug: can't upload csv to table with checkbox field #9891
  • [🐛 Type: Bug][🏗️ Status: In Resolution] 🐛 Bug: Cannot use s3 ovh plugin, error: "cannot read property of undefined (reading builder)" #9890
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Date Format #9869
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Form validation is failing if field name includes [] square brackets #9856
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Can't paste in search box for linked table #9846
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Duplicate Storage Providers in Setup Page #9828
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: webhook is not working with External Source DB #9787
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Date Range field type and show on Calendar #9785
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: One-To-One Link Field - Cannot Search #9439
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Issue with last record while paginating #9376
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Initial invitation e-mail is sent twice #8460
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Personal view or how to how to allocate work space. #6252
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] [Feature] Rollback the database changes to certain time or tag #2077

What's Changed

  • Release 0.258.2 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9854
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9820
  • fix(nc-gui): replace [ ] with _ by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9857
  • fix(nc-gui): show meaningful error to user if import url is not accessible by @yooneskh in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9822
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9855
  • docs/faq base-info by @AMEESHAARACKAL in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9863
  • feat: account delete migration by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9843
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9862
  • chore: sync various by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9864
  • feat(nc-gui): workspace icon by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9722
  • Nc calendar end date by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9831
  • fix(nc-gui): form view elements over the attachment/pdf viewer by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9867
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9868
  • docs: Nested list and commented lines corrections by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9872
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9870
  • fix: Handle sharedExecution timeout error in interceptor by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9873
  • fix: missing await for jobid generation by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9877
  • fix: hide twitter feed by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9885
  • fix(nc-gui): disable link cell paste if link record dropdown is open by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9887
  • Nc feat: add delimiters and encoding option in csv export and import extension by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9830
  • fix: csv checkbox import by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9892
  • fix: use alias when constructing hm filter query to avoid self-reference issue by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9899
  • Nc feat/user delete by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9889
  • fix: One-to-one excluded list filter bug by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9903
  • fix: calendar followups by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9901
  • fix: data is missing when select option is added via cell by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9906
  • fix: Base invite email related issues by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9907
  • fix: Merge duplicate plugin and recover broken plugins by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9894
  • 0.258.3 Pre-release by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9909

New Contributors

  • @yooneskh made their first contribution in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9822
  • @AMEESHAARACKAL made their first contribution in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9863

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.258.2...0.258.3

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.258.10: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
🚀 NocoDB : Bug Fix Release

⚠️ Deprecation of audit logs v1

When we initially introduced audit logs (v1), they were a foundational feature but remained incomplete and remained underdeveloped over time.

Here’s how: - Limited Coverage: The existing audit logs captured less than 25% of the actions within the product. Key operations—such as creating or modifying fields, filters, sorts, views, row comments, collaborators and webhooks etc—were not tracked at all. Over 150+ releases, the logs failed to keep up with NocoDB’s expanding feature set. - Incomplete Information: Even for the events that were logged, the data was partial and insufficient. For example record audit details often appeared fragmented, leaving gaps that fell short of enterprise-grade requirements.

As part of our commitment to providing the best possible experience with NocoDB we decided to deprecate audit logs v1. So audit logs v1 no longer be part of the open-source (OSS) variant and Enterprise Audit Logs (v2) will be introduced & exclusively available to self-hosted enterprise users and cloud users.

Audit Logs v2 built from the ground up to address these gaps to offer:

  • Comprehensive coverage of all critical actions within NocoDB.
  • Detailed and reliable logs suited to enterprise use cases.

We will always be transparent and proactive in every change, if you are looking for comprehensive audit logs (v2) - it will be soon available in our self-hosted and cloud enterprise solution.

🐛 Closed Issues

  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Rounded corners not the same across the Quick Palette #10074
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: S3 storage doesn't work #10072
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: turn off the infinite scrolling function edit data bug #10070
  • [✨ Type: Enhancement] [Enhancement] Input experience for link field #10012
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Auto-upstall ends with message "docker: 'compose' is not a docker command." #10009
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Auto-Upstall fails installing docker on AWS Linux with Error: unsupported distribution 'amzn' #10008
  • [🐛 Type: Bug][Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: Button Fields are removed when sync meta #9985
  • [🐛 Type: Bug][Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: No option to create form on the top nav bar #9963
  • [closed] Regarding the infinite table and the question about the select-all checkbox. #9954
  • [🐛 Type: Bug][Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: Attachment cell icon size and color #9948
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Single line text in expanded form #9946
  • [🐛 Type: Bug][🏗️ Type: In Develop Branch] pnpm start:backend : Property 'getType' does not exist on type 'Mime'. #9945
  • [🐛 Type: Bug][👩‍🔬 Status: In-Analysis] 🐛 Bug: Unable to see Bases after Upgrading to latest version #9931
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: 0.258.3: User Management Access Button Lost Labels #9924
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Docker 0.258.2: Cannot Annotate Attachment Fields #9912
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: thousands separator not work for Decimal column #9900
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Formula doesn't update and deletes data in other fields if ENTER isn't pressed in other fields #9897
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Long Text Field isn't accepting single line breaks #9896
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Field Type "Links" Relation type "One to One" - Search ERROR #9893
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: How to make a percentage of tasks done ? #9888
  • [🐛 Type: Bug][Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: Unable to view record in group view #9875
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Add generic s3 compatible storage (e.g. iDrive e2) #9865
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Webhook doesn't trigger when a lookup field is updated #9817
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Webhook does not fire on API row update #9761
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Cannot change the type of the first field #9758
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Button field incorrectly escaped the % sign #9698
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Add webhook trigger when a form is submited #9696
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] Feature: Allow "Monday" to be configured as first column in date picker #9633
  • [🐛 Type: Bug][Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: download view allowed even if Allow Download is checked #9630
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: text to numerical type conversion ignores negatives #9417
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Kanban shows 'Uncategorized' even on non-null enums #7537
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Using field values in the success message after submitting a form #7314
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Login e-mail form field is not autocompleted #6241
  • [👋 For : Community or Good First Issue] D.O. Spaces plugin fails with "null" popup #875

What's Changed

  • fix: bulkupsert endpoint by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9913
  • chore: update runner image by @salim-b in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9777
  • feat: base snapshots by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9879
  • fix: disable endDate for created-at, updated-at, formula by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9915
  • Nc docs/extension by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9914
  • docs: snapshot by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9886
  • fix: enable snapshots by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9920
  • fix: consider NC_S3_ENDPOINT besides NC_S3_REGION by @salim-b in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9053
  • fix(nc-gui): decimal cell thousands separator display issue by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9923
  • chore(docker): pin postgresql to 16.6 by @sinanmohd in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9926
  • Nc org chart extension by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9860
  • fix(GCS): set the response headers accordingly by @imscytha in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9858
  • fix: disable unsupported arg by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9943
  • fix(nc-gui): org role selector input display issue by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9936
  • fix(nc-gui): hide uncategorized stack if grouping field is required field by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9934
  • fix(nc-gui): user logo bg color is not same in all the places by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9933
  • chore: oos changes by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9919
  • chore: sync various by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9950
  • Nc fix: Update AI button config modal UI as per new design by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9921
  • docs : updated Snapshots docs by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9955
  • docs: updated extensions doc by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9944
  • feat(ui): persist extension sidebar state per base by @amandesai01 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9949
  • fix(extensions): typings for KvStore by @amandesai01 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9932
  • chore: migrate to rspack 🦀 by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9839
  • Nc fix/grid view attachment cell icon size by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9964

  • chore(extensions): eventing on extension by @amandesai01 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9972
  • Nc fix/delete ws by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9980
  • fix: hide calendar by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9982

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.258.11: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
🚀 NocoDB : Bug Fix Release

⚠️ Deprecation of audit logs v1

When we initially introduced audit logs (v1), they were a foundational feature but remained incomplete and remained underdeveloped over time.

Here’s how: - Limited Coverage: The existing audit logs captured less than 25% of the actions within the product. Key operations—such as creating or modifying fields, filters, sorts, views, row comments, collaborators and webhooks etc—were not tracked at all. Over 150+ releases, the logs failed to keep up with NocoDB’s expanding feature set. - Incomplete Information: Even for the events that were logged, the data was partial and insufficient. For example record audit details often appeared fragmented, leaving gaps that fell short of enterprise-grade requirements.

As part of our commitment to providing the best possible experience with NocoDB we decided to deprecate audit logs v1. So audit logs v1 no longer be part of the open-source (OSS) variant and Enterprise Audit Logs (v2) will be introduced & exclusively available to self-hosted enterprise users and cloud users.

Audit Logs v2 built from the ground up to address these gaps to offer:

  • Comprehensive coverage of all critical actions within NocoDB.
  • Detailed and reliable logs suited to enterprise use cases.

We will always be transparent and proactive in every change, if you are looking for comprehensive audit logs (v2) - it will be soon available in our self-hosted and cloud enterprise solution.

🐛 Closed Issues

  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: chrismas toggle button won't show for users who don't have any acess #10137
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Error in Grid when pageInfo is undefined in list api #10132
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Attachments - This request has been blocked; the content must be served over HTTPS. #10122
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Account delete "User doesn't exist" #10116
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Patch API for fields with select options #10109
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Unreferenced nocodb release 0.258.7 #10092
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Rows Inserted via REST API Not Visible in Kanban View #10057
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: One-to-many relation "Linking failed" when updating field since 0.258.7 #10056
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Unable to upgrade SQLite database from prior version #10052
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug:NC_EXPORT_MAX_TIMEOUT issue: Export fails for higher values and splits into multiple files #10024
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Attachment Display & Download Issue on SSL Fresh Installation #9786
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Nested Create Record Modal - Hide Fields, change display value field #9498
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: linked records - click opens linked record not removes it #7099
  • [📞 Status: Need Internal Discussion] 🔦 Feature: Add new rows and make cell editble in Locked View mode #5439
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: [Row Expansion] Copy Paste from excel to table + add more records as required #3567

What's Changed

  • Release 0.258.10 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10099
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10100
  • chore: bump to node 22 wip by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10065
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10069
  • Docs/webhook overview by @AMEESHAARACKAL in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10085
  • fix(nc-gui): update sort toolbar menu dropdown UI same as groupby by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10103
  • fix: One-to-many relation "Linking failed" by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10107
  • fix: order migration recovery by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10102
  • fix: cannot delete id column by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10105
  • feat: snowflake animation by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10108

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.260.0 : Record reorder & Insert anywhere
entry.content:
🚀 NocoDB : Feature Release

We’re excited to introduce Record Re-order & Insert Anywhere in NocoDB!

Drag-and-Drop to Reorder Records: Easily organize your records by dragging and dropping them within the grid. Whether you're prioritizing tasks, arranging items, or customizing views, you now have the freedom to structure your data just the way you need.

Insert New Record Anywhere: Adding new records is more intuitive than ever. Use the Insert Above and Insert Below options in the record context menu to place new entries exactly where they belong, saving time and reducing manual adjustments.

These powerful enhancements give you full control over your data, allowing for smoother workflows, better organization, and improved usability when working with large datasets.

🐛 Closed Issues

  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Update website footer year to 2025 #10177
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Auto Upstall fails Docker installation on Amazon Linux #10160
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Unable to Directly Add a Record to an External Database #9490
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Multi field editor - show system fields #9264
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Year formula for date fields #8721
  • [closed] [Enhancement] add the function of "number format options" under the rollup column #5312
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Drag and Drop Rows #4748
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Share View - Custom URL/Custom UUID #3963

What's Changed

  • Release 0.258.11 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10149
  • chore: add optimize deps by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10141
  • chore: add missing py3-setuptools dep by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10151
  • docs: mark personal view as cloud only by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10152
  • fix: avoid decrypting global integration by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10153
  • feat(nc-gui): Multi field editor - show system fields by @amandesai01 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10086
  • feat(nc-gui): number format options for rollup column by @amandesai01 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10088
  • Node 22 docker build issue by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10155
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10150
  • feat: record reorder wip by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10058
  • Fix: Fields menu improvement by @yooneskh in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10135
  • Nc fix add lookup by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10163
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10157
  • Upstall script - add worker service for ee edition by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10164
  • fix(nc-gui): prevent loading column hash in public or localMode by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10165
  • Upstall script: remove duplicate service prop by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10166
  • Sync master with develop brach by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10158
  • feat: enable i18n in ee by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10162
  • fix(nc-gui): form view logo alignment issue by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10167
  • Fix: update data overwrites the insert data in grid by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10156
  • fix: use proper reference for related model id by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10170

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.260.1: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
🐛 Closed Issues

  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Clarification on Adding New i18n Keys and Synchronization Across Language JSON Files #10204
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Webhook not Triggering after Update #10201
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: AVG() not working as expected it does a ADD() on lookup fields. #10200
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: SUBSTR function with DateTime Field does not work correctly #10197
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Cannot Access NocoDB after Installation via Coolify #10191
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Failed to duplicate base #7428

What's Changed

  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10188
  • fix(nc-gui): record editor and calendar fixes by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10181
  • Revert to Node.js 18 due to lack of pkg support for Node.js 22 by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10189
  • Nc fix/import data new UI by @yooneskh in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10161
  • Revert to Node.js 18 due to lack of pkg support for Node.js 22 by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10190
  • Print correct app url on init based on env by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10198
  • fix: add missing pks by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10193
  • chore: AI features follow up by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10208
  • chore(nc-gui): lint by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10209
  • fix: suppress not valid json errors by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10207
  • better language name by @lmalma in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10196
  • Update chinese.md by @bestlaw66 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10054
  • Nc refactor/rich text by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10224
  • fix: monospace font issue by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10225
  • fix: duplicate fails if there is an invalid formula or button by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10214
  • fix: job with empty data by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10232
  • chore: enable shutdown hooks by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10229

New Contributors

  • @bestlaw66 made their first contribution in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10054
